safetyTips: Social distancing measures in place, video calls available
name: The Rose
description: The Rose is doing takeouts on Friday with all proceeds going to the Deal Food Bank. Suggested donation £9. Add a bottle of The Rose house red or white wine £10. Pick up from The Rose, this Friday 5-6pm (some local delivery available). Order in advance by Friday AM and check out their instagram @therosedeal to see what's cooking.
